body: What happened to the friend system?  I wanna have more friends but I don't know how to add them. XD  The older one had a more simple idea whereas this new system sometimes confuses me. Any Help?
body_tagged: What happened to the friend system?  I wanna have more friends but I don't know how to add them. XD  The older one had a more simple idea whereas this new system sometimes confuses me. Any Help?
title: Question Regarding Website

replies.body: Adding friends on the new website is currently disabled, however it will be re-added in the upcoming future. Stand by! :)
replies.body_tagged: Adding friends on the new website is currently disabled, however it will be re-added in the upcoming future. Stand by! :)

replies.body:
I have seen you play and I believe you could be a wonderfully skillful
asset to my team however my team only has one person much like yours
the catch is you would have to leave your team 

Plz accept the request and Join "Da Destroyers"
